name: top_music
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kwai.
Tool description: Kwai Private API (TikTok like mobile app), Best Kwai Scraping API, non-blocking API, contact us if you want a custom plan. http://t.me/aimadnet
API description: Fetch the top music tracks from the API.

kapi_proxy.description: Proxy to be used for the API call. Defaults to None.

count.description: Number of tracks to fetch. Defaults to '20'.

pcursor.description: Pagination cursor if paginated results are required. Defaults to None.

language.description: Language code for the results. Defaults to 'en'.

country.description: Country code for the results. Defaults to 'ma'.
